name: Doge Solar
description: Doge Solar is a 2d metaverse project, each player will transform into a 2D character in the metaverse, they will have a separate life in the virtual world. They will go to work, earn money, exchange, chat, make friends with other players in the metaverse world We focus on social, the connection of players in the virtual world, building Doge Solar to be their second home, so that they can entertain themselves after the pressure of real life.
